content:
Dear [Client's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. Regarding your recent email, I would like to confirm that we are committed to providing you with support throughout the agreed-upon three-month period, which commenced on [start date].

As you are aware, we have already delivered the complete Android solution with backend functionality. However, we have not yet received the marketing materials needed to publish the IOS version. We kindly request that you send us the necessary materials as soon as possible so that we can proceed with the publishing process.

We are pleased to hear that your team received the last point's fix we delivered on Thursday 16 February by the end of the working day. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you require any further assistance with the project.

We would also appreciate it if you could provide us with your feedback on the latest APK we released. We value your opinion and would like to ensure that our solution meets your requirements and expectations.

Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
